candidates.title: Has Bill Murray Died at 81, Wanting to See 'Americans United Under Trump'?
candidates.content:
Claim:
Actor-comedian Bill Murray died at age 81 in February 2019, expressing a wish to see Americans united under Trump.
On 9 February 2019, the Conservative Tears website published an article reporting that actor-comedian Bill Murray had died at the age of 81, expressing that he "wanted to see America unite under President Trump":
Bill Murray Dead at 81  Wanted To See Americans United Under Trump
William Billington Bill Murray is dead this evening in his home in Winnetka, Wisconsin. Murray, who left public life a few years ago to pursue a more conservative lifestyle, found out he was dying about three months ago but decided not to make a big deal out of it.
According to his spokesman and lawyer, Art Tubolls, Murray left very simple instructions for his passing:
Bill wanted to see America unite under President Trump and come together to fight against all the things hes fought against his entire career. When he wrote the movie Ghostbusters he used Slimer as an example of how feeding something causes dependence. Stripes was to teach the average American that anyone can be a hero if the timing is right.
None of this was true: at the time this report was published, Bill Murray was still very much alive and only 68 years old. The report of his death was another fabrication by Conservative Tears, a site which is part of the America's Last Line of Defense network of websites and Facebook pages that pump out a steady stream of inflammatory and politically divisive misinformation under the guise of proffering "satire."
candidates.description: Another lame celebrity death hoax from the lamest of junk news sites.

result.explanation:
The news caption claims that actor-comedian Bill Murray died at age 81 in February 2019 and expressed a wish to see 'Americans united under Trump.' This claim has been directly refuted by the retrieved related article from Snopes, a recognized fact-checking source. According to the Snopes article, the report of Bill Murray's death was part of a death hoax circulated by the website Conservative Tears. The article states that Bill Murray was very much alive at the time the claim was published, being only 68 years old. Furthermore, the quote attributed to Murray regarding wanting to see America unite under President Trump was fabricated. The article emphasizes that the report is a classic example of politically divisive misinformation dressed as satire, asserting that the claim regarding Murray's death and his supposed sentiments about unifying Americans is entirely false. 

Given these points, there is a clear contradiction between the news caption and the information found in the relevant article. Therefore, the news caption is deemed to be inaccurate. Furthermore, as the claim originates from a notable fact-checking site, it raises the confidence score in this assessment. 

The timeline also supports the contradiction, as February 2019 is precisely when the hoax was disseminated, directly relating to the claim of Murray's death. The credibility of the source (Snopes) ensures that the information is reliable and well-investigated.

   - **Donald Trump**: The mention of Trump aligns with the context of discussing political unity but the attributed quote has shown to be fabricated.

The fabricated quotes surrounding his sentiment about Trump further invalidated his portrayal in this caption.
   - Snopes specifically supported this by clarifying that the report was entirely false, marking it as politically motivated misinformation masking as satire.
   - The timeline of February 2019 aligns with when this hoax was particularly prevalent.

Due to these discrepancies, including conflicting ages, attributed quotes, and the stark contrast with established facts, the final evaluation leads to the conclusion that the entire premise of the caption is out of context and misrepresents Bill Murray's situation and statements. This warrants a confidence level of 10, due to the strong reliability of the evidence utilized for external validation and the significant contradiction present in the internal check results.
